column1: Uchi////We went there recently for a celebratory dinner
column2: our first time back in a while. Service was great
column3: as always. We ordered the machi cure
column6: the yellowtail lacked a bit of the usual smokiness that make it great. We ordered the nigiri sampler Â and were glad we did. Small pieces
column7: but ooh la la. And of course the Brussels sprouts. If you are real nice to your server
column8: you might even get a surprise to cap off your great night. And no
column10: not the kind of happy ending to get you in trouble with your wife!
